statements: SELECT * FROM user_interactions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click';
SELECT user_id, course_id FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_interactions WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'view';
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp, course_id FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE course_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'login' AND course_id = 4 ORDER BY user_id ASC, interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_interactions, course_id FROM user_interactions GROUP BY course_id HAVING total_interactions > 10;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM user_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type ORDER BY interaction_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_interaction_data WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT interaction_type, content_id FROM user_interaction_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, course_id, recommendation_score FROM course_recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 0.5;
SELECT recommendation_id, user_id, course_id, recommendation_date FROM course_recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC, recommendation_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_id, timestamp FROM user_interaction_data WHERE interaction_type = 'click'
SELECT user_id, timestamp, interaction_type FROM user_interaction_data WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interaction_data WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM user_interaction_data GROUP BY user_id, interaction_type HAVING interaction_count > 5;
SELECT course_id, recommendation_score, recommendation_date FROM course_recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC, recommendation_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(recommendation_score) AS total_score FROM course_recommendations WHERE recommendation_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_score > 50;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM courses WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND interaction_type = 'view';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS interaction_count FROM interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING interaction_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses WHERE course_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, course_id, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interaction_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interaction_data WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day';
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) FROM user_interaction_data GROUP BY interaction_type ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT course_id, recommendation_score, timestamp FROM course_recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 0.8 ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM user_experience_feedback WHERE LENGTH(feedback_text) > 20;
SELECT * FROM user_interaction_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, timestamp FROM user_interaction_data WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM user_experience_feedback WHERE LENGTH(feedback_text) > 50 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, name, email, age FROM user_profile WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM course_recommendations WHERE recommendation_score >= 4.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, course_id, recommendation_type, recommendation_date FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_type = 'positive';
SELECT feedback_id, user_id, course_id, rating, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE rating = 5 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, user_name, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, course_id, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE user_id = 1 AND course_id = 3;
SELECT recommendation_id, user_id, course_id, recommendation_type, recommendation_date FROM recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, user_id, course_id, rating, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
